channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Donald Trump Threatens To Investigate Chris Christie After Former New Jersey Governor Criticizes Him On ABC’s ‘This Week’
Nearly 2.5M people sign petition supporting illegal immigrant truck driver charged in fatal crash
Australia mushroom murderer Erin Patterson left me 'half alive', lone surviving victim says
Sole survivor of Australian mushroom poisoning grieves loss of wife and friends
Hopes fade for injured climber stuck up an icy mountain for 12 days after breaking her leg
Mexican drug lord Ismael 'El Mayo' Zambada to plead guilty to federal charges
item.description: Former Mexican cartel kingpin Ismael “El Mayo” Zambada is expected to plead guilty to federal charges related to his role in the violent drug trade th...

item.title: Wildfires threaten homes in Oregon and California, prompting hundreds of evacuations
item.description: Thousands of homes are under evacuation orders and warnings because of wildfires in Northern California wine country and in central Oregon

item.title: University of South Carolina all clear after unconfirmed reports of active shooter
item.description: Just days after false reports of active shooters at two other schools.

item.title: Keurig Dr Pepper to buy Peet's Coffee owner in $18 billion deal
item.description: Keurig Dr Pepper says it will buy Peet’s Coffee owner JDE Peet’s in an $18 billion (15.7 billion euro) deal

item.title: France summons US ambassador over 'unacceptable' letter about antisemitism
item.description: He wrote to Macron alleging France did not do enough to combat antisemitism.
